official-title.#text: To amend the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act to specify when bank holding companies may be subject to certain enhanced supervision, and for other purposes.

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

short-title.#text: Systemic Risk Designation Improvement Act of 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the
The table of contents for the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: is amended by striking the item relating to section 113 and inserting the following:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act
usc/12/5301/etseq

toc-entry.#text: Sec. 113. Authority to require enhanced supervision and regulation of certain nonbank financial companies and certain bank holding companies.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act/s:112/ss:a/p:2/sp:I

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Section 112 of the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act/s:112
Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act/s:113

quote.#text: , which have been the subject of a final determination under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act/s:113

header-in-text.#text: Authority to require enhanced supervision and regulation of certain nonbank financial companies and certain bank holding companies

text.#text: by amending the heading for such section to read as follows:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act/s:113/ss:c, d, e, f, g, h, i
Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act/s:113/ss:d, e, f, g, h, i, j
Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act/s:113/ss:b

header.#text: Bank holding companies subject to enhanced supervision and prudential standards under section 165

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , on a nondelegable basis and by a vote of not fewer than
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Financial Stability Oversight Council

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , in accordance with section 165, if the

determines that material financial distress at the bank holding company, or the nature, scope, size, scale, concentration, interconnectedness, or mix of the activities of the bank holding company, could pose a threat to the financial stability of the United States.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Financial Stability Oversight Council

fraction.#tail: of the voting members then serving, including an affirmative vote by the Chairperson, may determine that a bank holding company shall be subject to enhanced supervision and prudential standards by the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act/s:113/ss:c/p:1

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall use an indicator-based measurement approach, and consider—
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Financial Stability Oversight Council

text.#text: the size of the bank holding company;
the interconnectedness of the bank holding company;
the extent of readily available substitutes or financial institution infrastructure for the services of the bank holding company;
the global cross-jurisdictional activity of the bank holding company; and
the complexity of the bank holding company.
